GSD.description:
xprtrdma: treat all calls not a bcall when bc_serv is NULL

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.122 by commit 8dbae5affbdbf524b48000f9d357925bb001e5f4. For more details please see the references link.
